name: df-uss
body: |- wceq(cuss, cmpt(s0, universe, co(cfv(cunif, cv(s0)), crest, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the uniform structure extractor function. Similarly with ~ df-topn this differs from ~ df-unif when a structure has been restricted using ~ df-ress ; in this case the ` UnifSet ` component will still have a uniform set over the larger set, and this function fixes this by restricting the uniform set as well. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)
